strow.stentry: The cuticle is the semi-circular layer of almost invisible dead skin cells that "ride out on" and cover the back of the visible nail plate while the eponychium is the fold of skin cells that produces the cuticle.
The formative layer of cells underlying the fingernail or toenail.

A cuticle shaver is an instrument with metal prongs, which are used to trim any over hang skin around nails, over grown cuticles. The trimmer needs to be used carefully and gently as to not damage cuticle skin.

A cuticle pusher is a simple nail tool used to perform manicures and pedicures. It pushes the skin from your cuticles back and away from your nails to help your nails grow stronger. Wooden pushers are best because they do minimal damage to the nail bed.
You use cuticle remover to remove the dead skin around your nails. It gives your fingernail a chance to breathe, and it avoids your skin from growing with the nail.
